rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C189268

self.title: CDISC Protocol Study Blinding and Unblinding Attribute Terminology

definition: A terminology value set relevant to the attributes of the study blinding and unblinding entity.
name: Study Blinding and Unblinding Attribute Terminology
preferredTerm: CDISC Protocol Study Blinding and Unblinding Attribute Terminology
submissionValue: Study Blinding and Unblinding Attribute Terminology
synonyms: Study Blinding and Unblinding Attribute Terminology

terms.definition: A study product whose appearance and characteristics are the same between each investigational agent and control.
The methodology used for enacting study blinding.

The type of experimental design used to describe the level of awareness of the study subjects and/ or study personnel as it relates to the respective intervention(s) or assessments being observed, received or administered.
A study event during which the treatment assignment is made known to the subject, investigator, and/or other trial personnel.
A description of the methodology used for planned or unplanned unblinding of the study.
A study event during which the treatment assignment is made known to the subject, investigator, and/or other trial personnel.
